mapper.select: select p_desc from t_perm p inner join t_role_perm rp on p.pe_id = rp.pe_id inner join t_user_role ur on rp.ro_id = ur.ro_id inner join t_user u on ur.u_id = u.u_id where u.u_phone = #{phone} and p.p_desc != ''
select u.u_id,u.u_phone,u.u_name,u.status,r.ro_name from t_user u inner join t_user_role ur on ur.u_id = u.u_id INNER JOIN t_role r on r.ro_id = ur.ro_id where r.ro_id != 1
mapper.update: update t_user set status = #{status} where u_id = #{uid}
